violations.excerpt: name does not meet format requirements

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text: I think the name is fine. It’ll just need a manual merge in three days

discussion.author: j-fu
discussion.text:
[noblock]
Just a reminder about the manual merge ;) Is there a need to add the "Override AutoMerge: name similarity is okay" label here ?

As for the name situation: this package is intended to be a wrapper of the [ADOL-C](https://github.com/coin-or/ADOL-C) algorithmic differentiation library, therefore the name.

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text: I don’t have merge permissions, but I’ll ask on Slack for a full maintainer to manually merge. It sometimes takes a few days and multiple reminders before someone gets around to it. [noblock]
